60 AMAZON SUSTAINABILITY    PEOPLEEmployees
From our software engineers, to the associates in our 
fulfillment centers, to the drivers delivering packages 
to our customers—our employees are critical to 
our mission of being Earth’s most customer-centric 
company. Our ranks are full of smart, passionate 
people who are building new products and services 
every day on behalf of our customers.
